name: Perdomo - Small Batch Series - Sun Grown - Half Corona
brand: Perdomo, Small Batch Series, Sun Grown
additionalNotes: Nick Perdomo is the founder of Perdomo Cigars and the man responsible for creating an extensive portfolio of blends that are well-made, well-priced and exceptionally popular among cigar lovers. High quality control standards and consistently rich flavors with an attractive range of strengths have made Perdomo a requested brand. With several wrapper varieties to choose from, Perdomo has a distinct blend for every palate.Â
